\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.name}
\label{configuration:DatabaseName}
\ClearAPI
The name of the database. If \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection} is not set, this field is not evaluated. However, it is much more convenient to use single properties than \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection}.
